articles.title: Sun fires massive solar flares directly at Earth; Australia, Japan and China witness radio blackouts - WION
articles.description: The Sun has released two powerful solar flares over the past one week, causing radio blackouts in some regions. A newly emerged sunspot region, named AR3663, is understood to be behind these solar flares, which were fired off within just six hours of each oth…

articles.title: 3 bodies found in Mexico identified as Australian and American surfers killed for truck's tires - KABC-TV
articles.description: Thieves apparently killed the three, who were on a surfing trip to Mexico's Baja peninsula, to steal their truck because they wanted the tires.
articles.content:
MEXICO CITY -- Relatives have identified three bodies found in a well as those of two Australian surfers and one American who went missing last weekend, Mexican authorities said Sunday.

articles.title: 'I'll try not to make that mistake again' – Ben O'Connor pays price for Pogačar pursuit at Giro d'Italia - Cyclingnews
